sources.name: SRC_CHARGE_BACK_DETAIL_LINE
sources.script:
source(output(
		CHARGE_BACK_ID as string,
		CHARGE_BACK_DETAIL_LINE_ID as string,
		VERSION_NUMBER as string,
		CURRENT_LINE_FLAG as string,
		CONTRACT_NUMBER as string,
		MEMBER_IDENTIFIER as string,
		MEMBER_IDENTIFIER_CODE as string,
		MEMBER_COMPANY_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_NDC as string,
		DETAIL_STATUS_CODE as string,
		CHARGE_BACK_AMOUNT as string,
		REJECTION_REASON_CODE as string,
		WHOLESALER_INVOICE_NUMBER as string,
		WHOLESALER_ACQUISITION_COST as string,
		QUANTITY_PURCHASED as string,
		INVOICE_DATE as string,
		CONTRACT_PRICE as string,
		NDC_FORMAT as string,
		WHOLESALER_CONTRACT_ID as string,
		SUBMITTED_UNIT_OF_MEASURE as string,
		SUBMITTED_QUANTITY as string,
		SUBMITTED_WHOLESALER_COST as string,
		SUBMITTED_CONTRACT_PRICE as string,
		SPECIALIST_ID as string,
		DATE_UPDATED as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRC_CHARGE_BACK_DETAIL_LINE

transformations.name: EXP_CHARGE_BACK_DETAIL_LINE
transformations.script:
SRC_CHARGE_BACK_DETAIL_LINE derive(o_INS_PRCS_ID = '$$PROCESS_ID',
		o_INS_RUN_ID = '$$PROCESS_RUN_ID',
		v_DELTA_COL_VAL = 'SETMAXVARIABLE($$DELTA_COL_VAL,SESSSTARTTIME)',
		o_INS_DT = 'SYSTIMESTAMP()') ~> EXP_CHARGE_BACK_DETAIL_LINE
